bug.author: jstestsuite
bug.summary: Unable to use any of the prebuilt Unreal enviornments with ROS on Linux
bug.description: When trying to run the prebuild Unreal environments following the ROS tutorial: https://github.com/microsoft/AirSim/tree/master/ros/src/airsim_tutorial_pkgs The following error occurs: Exception raised by the API: rpclib: server could not find function 'getImuData' with argument count 2. error

comments.comment: Prebuilt environments for Linux are quite old (a year ago now). The API was probably added after the release, it'll be better to build AirSim from source and use
